title: Conq or Electrocute on Lee?
body: Seriously, I am seeing both. What works best in what situations? I just got into Lee and he's really fun.

replies.body: I suck with conq. Definately enjoy eloctrocute more
I like elec better for the instagib

> [{quoted}](name=DingDongDanger,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EKyEexEA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-04-15T10:24:36.237+0000)
>
> what about titanic or ravenous?

titanic is usually  better unless you want to go nuts and have fun
